hours_text:
[](events-calendar.shtml)

#### Pre-Inaugural Family Festivities!  
Saturday 1/17  
12:00 – 3:00 pm.

Drop by for our free pre-Inauguration festivities! From 12 - 3 pm, families can enjoy an assortment of science and hands-on activities throughout the Museum. The 2:00 pm Planetarium show, "Worlds Beyond Earth," will be free (first come basis.) 

[](events-upcoming.shtml)

#### [Science Under the Stars](events-upcoming.shtml)

###### Galactic Monsters: Active Supermassive Black Holes and their Effects on Galaxies

January 17, 4:15 pm  
  
Join us in the Planetarium for a free talk with Dr. Lauranne Lanz, The College of New Jersey.

[](events-upcoming.shtml)

#### [Annual Scouting Day](events-upcoming.shtml)

January 31  
  
Join us at the New Jersey State Museum with your Scouting troop and work towards fulfilling requirements for three badges - all in one day! Complete details and registration available with this link. <https://events.humanitix.com/annual-scouting-day-event-astronomy-geology-and-environmental-science>

[](events-upcoming.shtml)

#### [Teen Art Drop-in Hour](events-upcoming.shtml)

January 8, 3:00 pm - 4:00 pm  
  
Stop by and learn to make your own sketchbook! Free.
